PHRASE.LANG: kName
Finger-pinching Crab (Right Hand, Men)
Crabe pinceur de doigt (main droite, homme)
In den Finger zwickende Krabbe (rechte Hand, Herren)
Granchio mordi-dita (mano destra, uomo)
Cangrejo en el dedo (mano derecha, hombre)
人差し指を挟むカニ（右手・男性）
집게 손가락을 문 게(오른손, 남성)
Finger-pinching Crab (Right Hand, Men)
夾著食指的螃蟹（右手/男用）
夾著食指的螃蟹（右手/男用）
Finger-pinching Crab (Right Hand, Men)
kDesc
A crab that pinched your finger when you weren't paying attention. It hurts, but not too much. [#Legal]
Un crabe qui vous a pincé le doigt dans un moment d'inattention. C'est douloureux, mais pas trop. [#Legal]
Eine Krabbe, die sich in einem unachtsamen Moment den Finger geschnappt hat. Es tut weh, aber nicht zu sehr. [#Legal]
Un granchio che ti ha morso la mano quando non stavi attento. Fa male, ma non troppo. [#Legal]
Un cangrejo que te ha pinzado el dedo cuando no estabas prestando atención. Duele, pero no demasiado. [#Legal]
うっかりカニに指を挟まれた。ちょっと痛いが、耐えられないほどではない。[#Legal]
무심코 게에게 손가락을 물렸다. 조금 아프지만, 견딜 수 없을 정도는 아니다. [#Legal]
A crab that pinched your finger when you weren't paying attention. It hurts, but not too much. [#Legal]
這隻螃蟹在您不留神時夾住您的手指。雖然有點痛，但沒有大礙。[#Legal]
這隻螃蟹在您不留神時夾住您的手指。雖然有點痛，但沒有大礙。[#Legal]
A crab that pinched your finger when you weren't paying attention. It hurts, but not too much. [#Legal]
